app.name: Music Stream Match

import.loadedTracks: {{total}} টির মধ্যে {{count}} টি গান লোড হয়েছে

invitation.tagline: স্ট্রিমিং পরিষেবাগুলির মধ্যে আপনার প্লেলিস্ট স্থানান্তর করুন
invitation.title: আমন্ত্রণ কোড
invitation.label: আমন্ত্রণ কোড
invitation.error: অনুগ্রহ করে একটি আমন্ত্রণ কোড লিখুন
invitation.invalid: অবৈধ আমন্ত্রণ কোড। কোড পরীক্ষা করে আবার চেষ্টা করুন।
invitation.noCode: আমন্ত্রণ কোড নেই? প্রশাসকের সাথে যোগাযোগ করুন।

apple.authorizingHint: অনুগ্রহ করে পপআপ উইন্ডোতে আপনার Apple ID দিয়ে সাইন ইন করুন
apple.authFailed: Apple Music-এ সংযোগ করতে ব্যর্থ হয়েছে

welcome.title: Music Stream Match-এ আপনাকে স্বাগতম!
welcome.description: মিউজিক স্ট্রিমিং সেবাগুলির মধ্যে আপনার প্রিয় প্লেলিস্ট স্থানান্তর করার সবচেয়ে সহজ উপায়।

transfer.title: এটি কীভাবে কাজ করে
transfer.description: প্লেলিস্ট স্থানান্তর করা সহজ এবং দ্রুত:
transfer.feature1: উৎস সেবা এবং প্লেলিস্ট নির্বাচন করুন
transfer.feature3: স্থানান্তর শুরু করুন এবং সম্পূর্ণ হওয়ার জন্য অপেক্ষা করুন

providers.title: সমর্থিত সেবাগুলি
providers.description: এই জনপ্রিয় স্ট্রিমিং প্ল্যাটফর্মগুলির মধ্যে প্লেলিস্ট স্থানান্তর করুন:

invitation.title: আমন্ত্রণ কোড প্রয়োজন
invitation.description: অ্যাপটি ব্যবহার করতে, আপনার একটি আমন্ত্রণ কোড প্রয়োজন। আপনি এটি প্রশাসকের কাছ থেকে পেতে পারেন বা ডেমো কোড ব্যবহার করতে পারেন।

ready.title: শুরু করতে প্রস্তুত!
ready.description: আপনার আমন্ত্রণ কোড দিন এবং আপনার সঙ্গীত সংগ্রহ স্থানান্তর করা শুরু করুন।

support.title: লেখককে সমর্থন করুন
support.description: আপনি যদি এই অ্যাপটি পছন্দ করেন এবং এর উন্নয়নকে সমর্থন করতে চান, তাহলে নিম্নলিখিত প্ল্যাটফর্মগুলির মাধ্যমে করতে পারেন:

what.title: What
what.description: Music Stream Match is a free, open-source web application that lets you transfer playlists between TIDAL, Spotify, Deezer, and Apple Music. Simply log in to your source and target services, pick a playlist, and transfer it — all from your browser.

why.title: Why
why.description: Switching between music streaming services shouldn't mean losing your carefully curated playlists. Commercial playlist transfer tools are often paid, limited, or require you to hand over your credentials to a third-party server. Music Stream Match was built as a free, open-source alternative that runs entirely in your browser — your tokens never leave your device.

how.title: How
how.description: All authentication happens directly with the streaming provider via OAuth. Your tokens are stored only in your browser's localStorage and are never sent to any backend server we operate.
how.step1: Enter an invitation code to access the app
how.step2: Select a source streaming service and log in
how.step4: Select a target streaming service and log in
how.step5: Start the import — tracks are matched and added to the target playlist

free.title: Free, forever
free.description: Feel free to use however you like, but please do not sell it. It is free for everyone, forever.

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.intro: Music Stream Match ("the App") is a free, open-source web application that helps users transfer playlists between streaming music services. This Privacy Policy explains what data we collect, how we use it, and your rights.

localStorage.title: 2.1 Data Stored in Your Browser
localStorage.description: When you use the App, the following data is stored exclusively in your browser's localStorage and is never transmitted to our servers:
localStorage.tokens: OAuth tokens — access tokens and refresh tokens issued by the streaming services to authorize playlist operations on your behalf.
localStorage.arl: Deezer ARL cookie — an authentication reference link you provide manually.
localStorage.invitation: Invitation code and configuration — the code used to access the App.
localStorage.language: Language preference — your chosen display language.
localStorage.profile: Basic profile info — your username and user ID as returned by the streaming providers (used only for display purposes).
localStorage.noAccess: We do not have access to this data. It stays on your device and is never sent to any backend server.

analytics.title: 2.2 Google Analytics
analytics.description: We use Google Analytics to collect anonymous usage statistics such as pages visited, general interaction events, browser type, screen size, and geographic region. No personally identifiable information is deliberately collected.

proxy.title: 2.3 Cloudflare Worker Proxy (Deezer Only)
proxy.description: Deezer API requests are routed through a Cloudflare Worker proxy to handle CORS restrictions. This proxy may log standard HTTP request metadata as part of Cloudflare's default infrastructure.

howWeUse.title: 3. How We Use Data
howWeUse.tokens: Streaming service tokens — used solely to read your playlists from the source service and create/add tracks to playlists on the target service.
howWeUse.analytics: Analytics data — used to understand how the App is used, identify issues, and improve the user experience.
howWeUse.noSell: We do not sell or share your data with third parties for marketing purposes.
howWeUse.noProfiling: We do not use your data for profiling or targeted advertising.
howWeUse.noStore: We do not store your streaming credentials on any server.

thirdParty.title: 4. Third-Party Services
thirdParty.description: The App interacts with the following third-party services, each with its own privacy policy:

retention.title: 5. Data Retention
retention.browser: Browser localStorage data persists until you clear your browser data, log out, or clear the App's storage. You are in full control.
retention.analytics: Google Analytics data is retained according to Google Analytics default retention settings (14 months).
retention.cloudflare: Cloudflare logs are retained according to Cloudflare's standard log retention policy.

rights.title: 6. Your Rights
rights.access: Access — view all data stored by the App in your browser's developer tools (Application → localStorage).
rights.delete: Delete — clear all locally stored data at any time by clearing your browser's localStorage or using the log-out functionality.
rights.optOut: Opt out of analytics — use browser extensions such as Google Analytics Opt-out or enable "Do Not Track" in your browser settings.
rights.revoke: Revoke access — remove the App's OAuth permissions from your streaming service account settings at any time.

cookies.title: 7. Cookies
cookies.description: The App uses Google Analytics cookies (_ga, _ga_*) to distinguish unique visitors. No other cookies are set by the App. localStorage is used instead of cookies for application state.

children.title: 8. Children's Privacy
children.description: The App is not directed at children under 16. We do not knowingly collect any personal information from children.

changes.title: 9. Changes to This Policy
changes.description: We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time. Changes will be reflected by updating the "Last updated" date at the top of this page.

contact.title: 10. Contact
contact.description: If you have questions about this Privacy Policy, please contact us:
